entity.name: Alex Azar
entity.description: US Secretary of Health and Human Services Alex Azar

text:
WSJ: In late February, Trump called HHS Secretary Azar and threatened to oust Nancy Messonnier, the CDC's chief of respiratory diseases, after she said the agency was preparing for a potential pandemic and that community spread of the virus was likely.
https://t.co/Mbd92sKaha
